highlights.title: The kids ‘picked last in gym class’ gear up for Super Bowl
highlights.description: YouTube CEO Neal Mohan is expected to be there. Apple's Tim Cook, too.

highlights.title: xAI’s Babuschkin Says He Has Not Purchased London Penthouse
highlights.description: Igor Babuschkin, co-founder of Elon Musk’s xAI, said he is “not planning to purchase any property in the UK,” responding to a Bloomberg report that he had agreed to buy a penthouse overlooking London’s Hyde Park for about £57 million ($77.6 million).

business.title: The kids ‘picked last in gym class’ gear up for Super Bowl
business.description: YouTube CEO Neal Mohan is expected to be there. Apple's Tim Cook, too.

ai.title: xAI’s Babuschkin Says He Has Not Purchased London Penthouse
